title: Couple Relationship Get
description: How to get a couple resource.

response.body:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<gx:gedcomx xmlns:gx="http://gedcomx.org/v1/" xmlns:fs="http://familysearch.org/v1/" xmlns:atom="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom">
    <gx:relationship type="http://gedcomx.org/Couple" id="12345">
        <gx:link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/couple-relationships/12345/changes" rel="change-history" title="Couple Relationship Change History"/>
        <gx:link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/pid-1" rel="man" title="Person"/>
        <gx:link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/couple-relationships/12345/notes" rel="notes" title="Couple Relationship Notes"/>
        <gx:link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/pid-1" rel="person1" title="Person"/>
        <gx:link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/pid-2" rel="person2" title="Person"/>
        <gx:link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/couple-relationships/12345" rel="relationship" title="Couple Relationship"/>
        <gx:link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/couple-relationships/12345/source-references" rel="source-references" title="Couple Relationship Source References"/>
        <gx:link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/pid-2" rel="woman" title="Person"/>
        <gx:person1 resource="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/pid-1" resourceId="pid-1"/>
        <gx:person2 resource="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/pid-2" resourceId="pid-2"/>
        <gx:fact type="http://gedcomx.org/Marriage">
            <gx:date>
                <gx:original>June 1800</gx:original>
                <gx:formal>+1800-06</gx:formal>
            </gx:date>
            <gx:place>
                <gx:original>Provo, Utah, Utah, United States</gx:original>
            </gx:place>
        </gx:fact>
    </gx:relationship>
</gx:gedcomx>
